summary: This document is a Trading Authorization Agreement from TD Ameritrade, detailing the terms under which an Authorized Agent can trade on behalf of an account owner. It includes provisions for liability, compliance, and the responsibilities of both the account owner and the authorized agent. The document also references a specific case involving Richard Kahn and Southern Financial LLC.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the authorized agent for Southern Financial LLC, with trading authorization granted to him.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is authorized to act on behalf of Southern Financial LLC in trading activities.

keyFacts: The document is a Trading Authorization Agreement from TD Ameritrade.
Richard Kahn is authorized to trade on behalf of Southern Financial LLC.
The agreement outlines the responsibilities and liabilities of both the account owner and the authorized agent.
The document includes provisions for compliance with financial regulations.
The original date of the correspondence is February 13, 2019.
